data.name: Corpus Edax
data.detailed_description:
Corpus Edax is a first-person-melee RPG enveloped in an immersive-sim design philosophy.




The game takes place on a recently discovered planet that holds its own secret - after a series of global catastrophic events caused by CorpMend rendered Earth unlivable to humans, a mass exodus was planned to migrate hundreds of millions of people to this new planet in a desperate move.

You start your journey 15 years after the establishment of the World Government and you will shape the fate of a newly built city as it teeters on the brink of a revolution.


  • Character creation sheet so you can mold your character to your preferred playstyle.
  • Locked door? Hack it. Or lockpick it. Or just destroy it. Alternatively, convince a guard to open it for you.
  • Branching dialogues offer choice and consequence that will affect your story.

  • Melee combat combined with physics-based environmental combat. Pick up a chair, throw it, swing it or kick it onto someone.
  • Place objects in the world to reach or climb over fences, creating your own path.

*This page is being worked on along with the game - as the game evolves so will the steam page.*

data.short_description: A first-person-melee RPG set in a retro-futuristic city of Corpus Edax. Create your character and make your own choices in a reactive world on the brink of a revolution - fight, talk or sneak your way out of confrontation. Your decision, is the right decision.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD / 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti / AMD RX 580 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 6 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 Ti / AMD RX 5700 XT 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent hand-to-hand and melee combat with depictions of blood.
